title: Limited Social Protection for the Poorest
description: In 2021, only 4.68% of total social protection and labor benefits reached the poorest quintile in Burkina Faso, highlighting a significant gap in social safety nets.

title: Minimal Social Insurance Support for the Needy
description: As of 2018, a mere 3.01% of social insurance benefits were allocated to the poorest quintile, indicating limited support for the most vulnerable populations.

title: High Investment in Tertiary Education
description: In 2016, Burkina Faso's government expenditure per tertiary student was 351.47% of GDP per capita, reflecting a strong commitment to higher education.
